name: Bloom (itch) (Georgie Porgie)
description:
Bloom is a hypercasual game, play as a sprout shooting out of its seed pod, growing towards your destiny as a flower. Collect fertiliser and drills to help you on your way, and try to avoid bumping into obstacles on your way up.

Happy growing   :)

This game was made during the 2023 Global Games Jam, and was worked on by myself, Valeriya Lakhtikova, Sally Jones, Ian Griffiths, and Michelle Marham.

Additional Voices - Matthew Wright and Chris Sanders

Audio

Freesound - Watsnick comical-bite-and-chew Freesound - Mookie182 slurping Freesound - Siliconesound boing-sound Freesound - Aiwha ding Freesound - Duckduckpony foliage rustling Purple Planet -  The Waters Run Deep Purple Planet - We're On Our Way
